---
title: "R/exams quiz"
output: learnr::tutorial
runtime: shiny_prerendered
---

```{r setup, include = FALSE}
## package and list of various exercises
exams2learnr <- function(file, label = knitr::opts_current$get("label")) {
  force(label)
  x <- exams::xexams(file)[[1]][[1]]
  x <- list(
    text = x$question, 
    type = "learnr_text",
    learnr::answer(x$metainfo$solution, correct = TRUE)
  )
  knitr::opts_current$set(label = label)
  do.call(learnr::question, x)
}
exm <- list(
    c("swisscapital.Rmd", "capitals.Rmd"),
    "deriv.Rnw",
    "deriv2.Rnw",
    "fruit.Rmd",
    "boxplots.Rmd",
    "ttest.Rmd",
    "function.Rmd"
)
```
